channel.description: so my friend wanted to host a server so i edited him 1 and sent him the Rar. now he cant like run it it keeps saying its an error he has no-ip and everything...=S

item.title: Error Connecting To Server?[Server Offline] Som1 Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

[quote=“Z N0 N4M3 Z, post:4, topic:252851”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=334004.msg2601519#msg2601519 date=1230259157]
He probably didn’t portforward right. Otherwise there is something blocking your connection.
[/quote]

errmmm he downloaded utorrent and then put the port ast 43594… how do you portforward?[/quote]

Search portforward tutorial?

Read full topic
